steps.name: Given I login via API with email "" and password ""
And I open the Summa homepage
And I should see the Summa home page
When I create a client via API with clientId "", email "", firstName ""
When I click the create new menu
And I click create new audit
And I select created client for audit case
And I fill audit name "Test case name"
And I click create audit case button
And I verify "AuditClassificationContainer" is included to the page url
Wait for navigation
